I believe that we added some robustness to the history parsing.  If you see this again please post.  

Note that I have moved the activity wizard to the Sandbox because it is not of 2.0 quality and has had almost no attention since 1.0.  Details will be in the New & Noteworthy.  Do you still use it much?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Note that I have moved the activity wizard to the Sandbox because it is not of
> 2.0 quality and has had almost no attention since 1.0. 

I agree.

> Details will be in the New & Noteworthy.  Do you still use it much?

I use it rather infrequently, maybe once every few weeks.
